Li Mirage

02 Apr 2022 - berdandy

Mukluk posted another LI build, this time for the Mirage. I’ve archived the build below, but make sure to check out the video to see how to play it.

Gearing

  • Full Viper armour, with Runes of the Nightmare

  • Weapons:

    1. Axe/Pistol (Torment/Earth sigils)
    2. Blank/Sword (Torment/Earth sigils)

Note: as we re-use the axe, put the more expensive torment sigil on the axe, asyou only need one)

Traits and Skills
